title: WHITE MISCHIEF

Based on true facts, the film revolves around 6 brave soldiers who escape from the clutches of the Pakistan Army and risk death with honour and courage with sacrifice towards their journey home.

The film details the young man's relationship with his mother and his beginnings as a writer, while looking at what happens when the stories we tell become the stories we live.

title: TEMPTING DEVILS

title: MISS TEACHER
plot_des: Rose Dey is the new teacher at the university. She is very attractive and is a nymphomaniac. At the university, Rose meets Tanvesh and an affair begins.

title: LE BRIO
plot_des: After an incident, a brilliant professor known for his outbursts is forced to mentor the student he wronged for a speech contest.

title: CATS
plot_des: A cat named Blanket lives in the city with his son, Cape. One day, Cape decides to leave home and embarks on an adventure to find the legendary cat's paradise. To find his son, Blanket must overcome his fear and reconcile with his past.

title: LONE WOLF MCQUADE
plot_des: After helping the local police with some horse thieves, a Texas Ranger aims at a drug lord with arms trade as well. They're interested in the same woman and they're both into martial arts.

title: THE LAST STARFIGHTER
plot_des: Video game expert Alex Rogan finds himself transported to another planet after conquering The Last Starfighter video game only to find out it was just a test. He was recruited to join the team of best starfighters to defend their world from the attack.

title: THE QUIET EARTH
plot_des: A man named Zac Hobson awakens to find himself alone in the world. In a desperate attempt to search for others, he finds only two who have their own agenda.

title: THE GUN IN BETTY LOUS HANDBAG
plot_des: An ignored, small-town librarian confesses to a murder she didn't commit to get attention.

title: FREE WILLY
plot_des: When a boy learns that a beloved killer whale is to be killed by the aquarium owners, the boy risks everything to free the whale.

title: THE COWBOY WAY
plot_des: Two childhood friends who are rodeo cowboys travel from New Mexico to New York City searching for a friend who disappeared while looking for his daughter, who's just been smuggled into the US from Cuba.

title: MANNY  LO
plot_des: A pregnant teen and her younger sister run away from foster homes and kidnap a woman whom they believe can help with the pregnancy.

title: TRAINSPOTTING
plot_des: Renton, deeply immersed in the Edinburgh drug scene, tries to clean up and get out, despite the allure of the drugs and influence of friends.

title: ROSEWOOD
plot_des: A dramatization of a 1923 horrific racist lynch mob attack on an African-American community.

title: SHREK
plot_des: A mean lord exiles fairytale creatures to the swamp of a grumpy ogre, who must go on a quest and rescue a princess for the lord in order to get his land back.

title: IN JULY
plot_des: A young, insecure teacher embarks on a journey through Europe to Turkey, where he wants to see a woman again whom he believes to be his fate.

title: ORIGINAL SIN
plot_des: A woman, along with her lover, plans to con a rich man by marrying him, earning his trust, and then running away with all his money. Everything goes as planned until she falls in love with him.

title: FULL FRONTAL
plot_des: A day in the life of a group of men and women in Hollywood, in the hours leading up to a friend's birthday party.

plot_des: Irregular migrants Okwe and Senay work at a posh London hotel and live in constant fear of deportation. One night Okwe stumbles across evidence of a bizarre murder setting off a series of events that could lead to disaster or freedom.

title: WILLARD
plot_des: A young man with an unusual connection to rats uses them at his own sociopathic will.

title: 21 GRAMS
plot_des: A freak accident brings together a critically ill mathematician, a grieving mother, and a born-again ex-con.

title: BATTLE ROYALE II
plot_des: Three years after the failure of the last BR program, a second act is forged and a class of students are sent to an island with one objective: kill international terrorist Shuya Nanahara.

title: LA FIESTA
plot_des: Three bored roommates throw a wild weekend party full of love, sex and jealousy that will ultimately change their lives forever.

title: GOAL THE DREAM BEGINS
plot_des: The extremely talented Santiago Muñez is spotted by a Newcastle United scout and given a chance at professional football.

title: YUVA
plot_des: Michael, Arjun and Lallan, three men from three different strata of society, cross paths one morning in Calcutta and change one another's lives forever.

title: THE ISLAND

plot_des: Matty, a 41-year old mother of three with a husband in his midlife-crisis, meets 29-year old Johnny, a truck driver, who takes an interest in her.

plot_des: A drama about a woman who seems able to overcome everything for freedom, except for her past mistakes.

plot_des: Javier wants to forget his ex. But it's impossible when she's always online. Getting drunk and partying it's the only solution. Or not?

title: THE GAMBLER

plot_des: A story centered around a group of self-destructive skateboarders in Paris.

title: RAMPAGE

title: SOULMATE
plot_des: Two women who have been close friends since adolescence must cope with the changes that maturity brings.

title: MR  MME ADELMAN
plot_des: For more than 45 years, Sarah and Victor have been together. How did they do it? Who's really Sarah, this enigmatic woman who's always been on the shadow of her husband? Love, ambition and secrets feed this unusual couple's odyssey.

title: FRIDAY THE 13TH

plot_des: The unofficial sequel to 'Purple Rain' (1984). The Kid is now club owner and rival to Morris (Morris Day) who get into a fight for the Glam Slam Nightclub.

title: SCENES FROM A MALL
plot_des: On their 16th anniversary, a married couple's trip to a Beverly Hills mall becomes the stage for personal revelations and deceptions.

title: ARMY OF DARKNESS
plot_des: A sardonic hardware store clerk is accidentally transported to 1300 A.D., where he must retrieve the Necronomicon and battle an army of the dead so he can return home.

title: DEVILS ISLAND
plot_des: The story of families living in barracks, left by the US Army in Reykjavik at the conclusion of World War II.

title: TANGO

casts: ['Miguel Ángel Solá', 'Cecilia Narova', 'Mía Maestro', 'Juan Carlos Copes']

title: MAIN PREM KI DIWANI HOON
plot_des: This is the story of Sanjana, a girl of today's generation full of life and vibrant ecstasy. She lives life on her own terms and gets very upset when her mother Susheela, arranges for her to see a boy leading to a marriage prospect.

title: ONCE UPON AN ANGEL
plot_des: A grief-stricken man who just lost his mother has a one night stand with a maid. What he doesn't know is that she's a virgin. He returns to his sad world of perfume business while she, unable to forget her first lover, follows him.

title: PETER PAN
plot_des: The Darling family children receive a visit from Peter Pan, who takes them to Never Never Land where an ongoing war with the evil Pirate Captain Hook is taking place.

title: ELF
plot_des: Raised as an over-sized elf, a human travels from the North Pole to NYC to meet his biological father who doesn't know he exists and is in desperate need of some Christmas spirit.

title: INFERNAL AFFAIRS
plot_des: A story between a mole in the police department and an undercover cop. Their objectives are the same: to find out who is the mole, and who is the cop.
casts: ['Andy Lau', 'Tony Chiu-Wai Leung', 'Anthony Chau-Sang Wong', 'Eric Tsang']

title: HOSTAGE
plot_des: When a family is held hostage, former hostage negotiator Jeff Talley arrives at the scene. Talley's own family is kidnapped and Talley must decide which is more important: saving a family he doesn't even know or saving his own family.

plot_des: It's ten years after the kidnapping of Martin Bristol. Taken from a backyard swing at his home at the age of six, he is forced to witness unspeakable crimes of a deranged madman. For years, Martin's whereabouts have remained a mystery...until now.

plot_des: Sonia moves with her kids to Trinidad where her husband Jo is working in the oil business. The milieu change and the discovery of an the affair her husband has been having makes her lose grip and go into a limbo.

plot_des: Two people come to the end of a spear in order to realize that the divisions between them are not real.

title: OPEN WATER 2 ADRIFT

title: LIVING HELL
plot_des: A mild-mannered teacher and a hazmat specialist have to figure out how to stop an unstoppable creature who feeds on light and energy, and moves with exponential speed, before it destroys everything in its path.

plot_des: A documentary on the safety of nuclear storage.

plot_des: Determined to make her own path in life, Princess Merida (Kelly Macdonald) defies a custom that brings chaos to her kingdom. Granted one wish, Merida must rely on her bravery and her archery skills to undo a beastly curse.

title: PLANET OF THE APES

title: MADE
plot_des: Two aspiring boxers, lifelong friends, get involved in a money-laundering scheme through a low-level organized crime group.

title: DOUBLE TAKE

plot_des: A woman trying to cope with the recent disappearance of her husband finds that the event uncovers some dark secrets. Subtitled.

plot_des: As the daring thief Arsène Lupin (Romain Duris) ransacks the homes of wealthy Parisians, the Police, with a secret weapon in their arsenal, attempt to ferret him out.

plot_des: A hardened detective in the Flying Squad of London's Metropolitan police. Based on the '70s UK TV show.

plot_des: The events of the new movie take place 30 years after the original one. The stars of this movie are Zhenya and Galya's son and Nadia and Ippolit's daughter. 2007

plot_des: A romantic comedy centered on a guy and a gal who try to keep their love alive as they shuttle back and forth between New York and San Francisco to see one another.

title: THE PERSONAL HISTORY OF DAVID COPPERFIELD

casts: ['Pavlik Jansen op de Haar', 'Jan Decleir', 'Fedja van Huêt', 'Betty Schuurman']

title: THE BANK JOB
plot_des: Martine offers Terry a lead on a foolproof bank hit on London's Baker Street. She targets a roomful of safe deposit boxes worth millions in cash and jewelry along with a treasure trove of dirty secrets.

Complicating matters are one of her father's ex-students, who wants to search through his papers, and her estranged sister, who shows up to help settle his affairs.

title: CRAZY
plot_des: A young French-Canadian, growing up in the 1960s and 1970s, struggles to reconcile his emerging homosexuality with his father's conservative values and his own Catholic beliefs.

title: HALF OF A YELLOW SUN
plot_des: Sisters Olanna and Kainene return home to 1960s Nigeria, where they soon diverge on different paths. As civil war breaks out, political events loom larger than their differences as they join the fight to establish an independent republic.

title: THE LEGO MOVIE 2 THE SECOND PART
plot_des: It's been five years since everything was awesome and the citizens are facing a huge new threat: Lego Duplo invaders from outer space, wrecking everything faster than they can rebuild.

title: ASTERIX AND OBELIX MANSION OF THE GODS
plot_des: In order to wipe out the Gaulish village by any means necessary, Caesar plans to absorb the villagers into Roman culture by having an estate built next to the village to start a new Roman colony.

title: UDTA PUNJAB
plot_des: A story that revolves around drug abuse in the affluent north Indian State of Punjab and how the youth there have succumbed to it en-masse resulting in a socio-economic decline.

title: COMA
plot_des: After a mysterious accident a young architect comes back to his senses in a very odd world. He must find out the exact laws and regulations of it as he fights for his life and keeps on looking for the exit to the real world.

title: A SIMPLE FAVOR
plot_des: Stephanie is a single mother with a parenting vlog who befriends Emily, a secretive upper-class woman who has a child at the same elementary school. When Emily goes missing, Stephanie takes it upon herself to investigate.

title: LAST CHRISTMAS
plot_des: Kate is a young woman subscribed to bad decisions. Working as an elf in a year round Christmas store is not good for the wannabe singer. However, she meets Tom there. Her life takes a new turn. For Kate, it seems too good to be true.

title: VALLEY GIRL
plot_des: Julie, a girl from the valley, meets Randy, a punk from the city. They are from different worlds and find love. Somehow they need to stay together in spite of her trendy, shallow friends.

title: THE BLACK CAULDRON
plot_des: A young boy and a group of misfit friends embark on a quest to find a dark magic item of ultimate power before a diabolical tyrant can.

title: SHES GOTTA HAVE IT
plot_des: Story of a woman and her three lovers.
casts: ['Tracy Camilla Johns', 'Tommy Redmond Hicks', 'John Canada Terrell', 'Spike Lee']

title: FRIGHT NIGHT PART 2
plot_des: Charley Brewster and Peter Vincent must face more vampires, out for revenge.

title: MAXIMUM RISK
plot_des: While seeking answers regarding the death of the twin brother he never knew he had, a French cop and his sibling's fiancée find themselves pursued by corrupt FBI agents and the Russian mafia.

title: PRIMARY COLORS
plot_des: A man joins the political campaign of a smooth-operator candidate for President of the U.S.

title: COLD MOUNTAIN
plot_des: In the waning days of the American Civil War, a wounded soldier embarks on a perilous journey back home to Cold Mountain, North Carolina to reunite with his sweetheart.

title: HARRY POTTER AND THE SORCERERS STONE
plot_des: An orphaned boy enrolls in a school of wizardry, where he learns the truth about himself, his family and the terrible evil that haunts the magical world.

title: KABHI KHUSHI KABHIE GHAM
plot_des: After marrying a poor woman, rich Rahul is disowned by his father and moves to London to build a new life. Years later, his now grown up little brother Rohan embarks on a mission to bring Rahul back home and reunite the family again.

title: FRIDAY AFTER NEXT
plot_des: Working as security guards, Craig and Day-Day run into the thief who stole their Christmas presents.

title: SILVER CITY
plot_des: The discovery of a corpse threatens to unravel a bumbling local politician's campaign for governor of Colorado.

title: NORTH COUNTRY
plot_des: A fictionalized account of the first major successful sexual harassment case in the United States, Jenson vs. Eveleth Mines, where a woman who endured a range of abuse while working as a miner filed and won the landmark 1984 lawsuit.

title: TALLADEGA NIGHTS THE BALLAD OF RICKY BOBBY
plot_des: Number one NASCAR driver Ricky Bobby stays atop the heap thanks to a pact with his best friend and teammate, Cal Naughton, Jr. But when a French Formula One driver, makes his way up the ladder, Ricky Bobby's talent and devotion are put to the test.
casts: ['Will Ferrell', 'John C. Reilly', 'Sacha Baron Cohen', 'Gary Cole']

title: THE HILLS HAVE EYES
plot_des: A family falls victim to a group of mutated cannibals in a desert far away from civilization.

title: LIFE OF PI
plot_des: A young man who survives a disaster at sea is hurtled into an epic journey of adventure and discovery. While cast away, he forms an unexpected connection with another survivor: a fearsome Bengal tiger.

title: ROCKET SCIENCE
plot_des: Looking for answers to life's big questions, a stuttering boy joins his high school debate team.

title: VITUS
plot_des: A twelve-year-old piano prodigy who suffocates from his parent's big dreams for him decides to make his escape--and with the aid of his grandfather--chase his own dreams instead.

title: I NOW PRONOUNCE YOU CHUCK  LARRY
plot_des: Two straight, single Brooklyn firefighters pretend to be a gay couple in order to receive domestic partner benefits.

title: MERCURY MAN
plot_des: After a brush with a strange substance, an average fireman transforms into something far greater than himself--the Mercury Man. Endowed with fantastic superpowers, he will now use his abilities to help conquer the forces of evil.

title: THE BOOK OF ELI
plot_des: A post-apocalyptic tale, in which a lone man fights his way across America in order to protect a sacred book that holds the secrets to saving humankind.

title: PARANORMAL ACTIVITY
plot_des: After moving into a suburban home, a couple becomes increasingly disturbed by a nightly demonic presence.

title: KITES
plot_des: A wounded man searches for his sweetheart in the Mexican desert while on the run from the police, bounty hunters, and others.

title: PRISONERS
plot_des: When Keller Dover's daughter and her friend go missing, he takes matters into his own hands as the police pursue multiple leads and the pressure mounts.

plot_des: Two decades after the first Independence Day invasion, Earth is faced with a new extra-Solar threat. But will mankind's new space defenses be enough?

plot_des: Movie star Vincent Chase, together with his boys Eric, Turtle, and Johnny, are back - and back in business with super agent-turned-studio head Ari Gold on a risky project that will serve as Vince's directorial debut.

plot_des: Henry is a handsome screenwriter who is trying to win the heart of the woman he truly loves. His plans are interrupted when he finds Magdalena, a little girl at his house.

plot_des: A pair of star-crossed dancers in New York find themselves at the center of a bitter rivalry between their brothers' underground dance clubs.

title: THE HOUSE

title: CHAPPAQUIDDICK
plot_des: Depicting Ted Kennedy's involvement in the fatal 1969 car accident that claims the life of a young campaign strategist, Mary Jo Kopechne.

title: CODA
plot_des: A famous pianist struggling with stage fright late in his career finds inspiration with a free-spirited music critic.

title: USED CARS
plot_des: When the owner of a struggling used car lot is killed, it's up to the lot's hot-shot salesman to save the property from falling into the hands of the owner's ruthless brother and used-car rival.

plot_des: A wide variety of eccentric competitors participate in a wild and illegal cross-country road race. However, the eccentric entrants will do anything to win the road race, including low-down, dirty tricks.

title: WHITE DOG
plot_des: A trainer attempts to retrain a vicious dog that's been raised to attack black people.

title: STARMAN
plot_des: An alien takes the form of a young widow's husband and makes her drive him across the country. The government tries to stop them.

title: DOWN AND OUT IN BEVERLY HILLS
plot_des: A rich but troubled family find their lives altered by the arrival of a vagrant who tries to drown himself in their swimming pool.

plot_des: To save Earth from an alien probe, Admiral James T. Kirk and his fugitive crew go back in time to San Francisco in 1986 to retrieve the only beings who can communicate with it: humpback whales.

plot_des: When CIA analyst Jack Ryan interferes with an IRA assassination, a renegade faction targets him and his family for revenge.

title: CLIFFHANGER
plot_des: A botched mid-air heist results in suitcases full of cash being searched for by various groups throughout the Rocky Mountains.

plot_des: Widow Frances Lacey is being sexually harassed by her boss while she tries to provide for her brood of six children. Also, her oldest son, Shayne, is constantly in trouble. When she's fired from her job, she decides to abandon Los Angeles.

title: LEPRECHAUN 2
plot_des: On his one thousandth birthday, an evil leprechaun selects the descendant of one of his slaves to have as his bride, leaving it up to the girl's boyfriend to save her.

plot_des: Brooklyn Cigar Store is a neighborhood hangout in Brooklyn with Auggie Wren/H.Keitel as center. Some people are interviewed about Brooklyn, spiced up with statistics on Brooklyn.

plot_des: The exiled royal physician to King Charles II devotes himself to helping Londoners suffering from the plague, and in the process falls in love with an equally poor woman.

plot_des: Frank Conner is an honest police officer who desperately needs to save his son's life. However, after losing all hope, he finds out that a criminal Peter McCabe in jail is his only savior.

plot_des: A commercial transport ship and its crew are marooned on a planet full of bloodthirsty creatures that only come out to feast at night. But then, they learn that a month-long eclipse is about to occur.

plot_des: An attorney defends an officer on trial for ordering his troops to fire on civilians after they stormed a U.S. embassy in a Middle Eastern country.
casts: ['Tommy Lee Jones', 'Samuel L. Jackson', 'Guy Pearce', 'Ben Kingsley']

title: THE GOLDEN BOWL
plot_des: A man marries an heiress for her money even though he is actually in love with her friend.

title: REBELS
plot_des: Musical retromovie from the 60's in Czech republic. Story about star-crossed lovers - student Tereza and a boy who deserted from the army.

title: A WALK TO REMEMBER
plot_des: The story of two North Carolina teens, Landon Carter and Jamie Sullivan, who are thrown together after Landon gets into trouble and is made to do community service.

title: GODFORSAKEN
plot_des: Two small-town Dutch boys have such a close socially unnatural friendship that they care nothing for human or divine rules and lose all grip on reality, sliding into violent crime.

title: MINDHUNTERS
plot_des: Trainees in the FBI's psychological profiling program must put their training into practice when they discover a killer in their midst.

title: DIRTY DANCING HAVANA NIGHTS
plot_des: High school senior Katey moves to Havana in November 1958, when her dad gets a promotion at Ford. She meets a local waiter, who introduces her to sensual Cuban music/dance. They enter a big dance contest for the prize when he gets fired.

title: THE GAME OF THEIR LIVES
plot_des: Based on a true story, this film tells the tale of the 1950 U.S. soccer team, who, against all odds, beat England 1 - 0 in the city of Belo Horizonte, Brazil. Although no U.S. team has ever won a World Cup title, this story is about the family traditions and passions which shaped the lives of the players who made up this team of underdogs.

title: THE BRIDGE OF SAN LUIS REY
plot_des: In 1714 Peru, a friar is tried by the Inquisition for questioning God's intentions when five die in the collapse of an Andean rope bridge.

title: THE HOME TEACHERS
plot_des: Greg and Nelson are two complete opposites on a mission to complete their Home Teaching on the last day of the month--even if it kills them.

title: THE BLUE LIGHT
plot_des: A 17 y.o. Japanese secondary school student is living happily with his mom and sister but one day his stepdad returns, drunk much of the time and cruel to his mom and sister. Is there such a thing as the perfect murder?

title: THE NEW WORLD
plot_des: The story of the English exploration of Virginia, and of the changing world and loves of Pocahontas.

title: CRUEL WORLD
plot_des: Reeling from his dismissal from a reality show, a deranged runner-up holds a group of co-eds hostage on the set of his own fictitious show, where losers suffer a deadly fate.

title: RED ANTS
plot_des: A teenager who runs with her father a filling station struggles to find her own path of life, since she is too much involved into her father's life since the death of her mother.

title: REVOLUTIONARY ROAD

plot_des: When a group of strangers at a dusty roadside diner come under attack by demonic forces, their only chance for survival lies with an archangel named Michael, who informs a pregnant waitress that her unborn child is humanity's last hope.

plot_des: Two strangers meet in a nightclub and end up spending the night together in a hotel.

title: WE BOUGHT A ZOO
plot_des: Set in Southern California, a father moves his young family to the countryside to renovate and re-open a struggling zoo.

title: I FRANKENSTEIN
plot_des: Frankenstein's creature finds himself caught in an all-out, centuries old war between two immortal clans.

title: THE LETTERS
plot_des: A drama that explores the life of Mother Teresa (Juliet Stevenson) through letters she wrote to her longtime friend and spiritual advisor, Father Celeste van Exem (Max von Sydow) over a nearly fifty-year period.

title: THE DIVIDE

title: BRNING

title: DONT BREATHE
plot_des: Hoping to walk away with a massive fortune, a trio of thieves break into the house of a blind man who isn't as helpless as he seems.

title: LITTLE MEN
plot_des: A new pair of best friends have their bond tested by their parents' battle over a dress shop lease.

title: LEAGUE OF GODS
plot_des: Based on the 16th-century Chinese novel Feng Shen Yan Yi (The Investiture of the Gods), the story tells of how King Zhou of Shang becomes a tyrant due to the wiles of Daji, a vixen spirit who is disguised as one of his concubines.

plot_des: Recruited by the East India Company, a local thug infiltrates a troop of patriotic bandits who plan to overthrow the British regime and reclaim their independence.

plot_des: In 1938, a German singer falls in love with a Jewish composer in Zurich, who helps Jews flee Nazi Germany. She wants to help but is forced back to Germany. Her song "Lili Marleen" becomes a hit with soldiers and the Nazi top.

plot_des: A TV-network boss pits a wrestler called Zeus against a wrestler called Rip in a wrestling match.

plot_des: In 1999, Claire's life is forever changed after she survives a car crash. She rescues Sam and starts traveling around the world with him. Writer Eugene follows them and writes their story, as a way of recording dreams is being invented.

title: THE MARRYING MAN
plot_des: A millionaire playboy goes into Las Vegas and comes out married to a woman he barely knows.

title: KIDS
plot_des: A day in the life of a group of teens as they travel around New York City skating, drinking, smoking and deflowering virgins.

title: SAFE

plot_des: The accidental shooting of a boy in New York leads to an investigation by the Deputy Mayor, and unexpectedly far-reaching consequences.

title: ABANDON
plot_des: An investigation of a college student's missing boyfriend becomes quite strange when she begins to see him periodically.

plot_des: After a baby monitor picks up another channel, Anna begins reliving the nightmare she'd recently escaped.
casts: ['Noomi Rapace', 'Kristoffer Joner', 'Vetle Qvenild Werring', 'Stig R. Amdam']

title: ICE AGE CONTINENTAL DRIFT
plot_des: Manny, Diego, and Sid embark upon another adventure after their continent is set adrift. Using an iceberg as a ship, they encounter sea creatures and battle pirates as they explore a new world.

title: THE FROZEN GROUND

title: BUGSY
plot_des: The story of how Benjamin "Bugsy" Siegel started Las Vegas.

title: HIGHWAY TO HELL
plot_des: An eloping bride is taken into Hell, and her fiancé must pursue.

title: DRAGON
plot_des: A fictionalized account of the life of the martial arts superstar.

title: A LOW DOWN DIRTY SHAME
plot_des: An ex-cop, now a private detective, takes on the search for the millions stolen by a drug lord.

title: SENSE AND SENSIBILITY
plot_des: Rich Mr. Dashwood dies, leaving his second wife and her three daughters poor by the rules of inheritance. The two eldest daughters are the title opposites.

title: HAMSUN

casts: ['Max von Sydow', 'Ghita Nørby', 'Anette Hoff', 'Gard B. Eidsvold']

title: THE STUPIDS
plot_des: An incredibly dull-witted family unknowingly stumble upon an illegal weapons deal while on the trail of their "stolen" garbage.

title: HOME ALONE 3

casts: ['Alex D. Linz', 'Olek Krupa', 'Rya Kihlstedt', 'Lenny von Dohlen']

title: TADPOLE
plot_des: Coming-of-age story about a suave 15-year-old prep school student who falls in love with his stepmother. When her best friend responds to his advances, he suddenly finds himself in way over his head.

title: WHITE NOISE

title: THE CURIOUS CASE OF BENJAMIN BUTTON

title: THE WOMEN
plot_des: A wealthy New Yorker wrestles with the decision to leave her cheating husband, as she and her friends discover that women really can have it all.

title: BLACK IRISH
plot_des: A teenage boy longs to win the attention of his emotionally distant father.

title: THERE WILL BE BLOOD
plot_des: A story of family, religion, hatred, oil and madness, focusing on a turn-of-the-century prospector in the early days of the business.

plot_des: A young lonely woman takes a soul-searching journey across America to resolve her questions about love while encountering a series of offbeat characters along the way.

title: WHATS YOUR NUMBER
plot_des: A woman looks back at the past nineteen men she's had relationships with in her life and wonders if one of them might be her one true love.

title: THE COURIER

title: JONAH HEX
plot_des: The U.S. military makes a scarred bounty hunter with warrants on his own head an offer he cannot refuse: in exchange for his freedom, he must stop a terrorist who is ready to unleash Hell on Earth.

plot_des: While searching for honey, Pooh and his friends embark on an adventure to find Eeyore's missing tail and rescue Christopher Robin from an unknown monster called The Backson.

title: DRAGON TRAP

title: HOBO WITH A SHOTGUN
plot_des: A homeless vigilante blows away crooked cops, pedophile Santas, and other scumbags with his trusty pump-action shotgun.

title: AADUKALAM
plot_des: In a village in South India, rearing roosters, maintaining them and using them for fights are a way of life and a matter of honor and lifeline to many people.

title: TROUBLE WITH THE CURVE
plot_des: A daughter tries to remedy her dysfunctional relationship with her ailing father, a decorated baseball scout, by helping him in a recruiting trip which could be his last.

title: DADDY IM A ZOMBIE
plot_des: The misadventures of a teenager girl in her new life as zombie.

title: MORTDECAI
plot_des: Juggling angry Russians, the British Mi5, and an international terrorist, debonair art dealer and part-time rogue Charlie Mortdecai races to recover a stolen painting rumored to contain a code that leads to lost gold.

title: CHRISTOPHER ROBIN
plot_des: A working-class family man, Christopher Robin, encounters his childhood friend Winnie-the-Pooh, who helps him to rediscover the joys of life.
After mobiles start mysteriously flying out of the hands of people in Chennai, Dr Vaseegaran summons his trusted robot Chitti to ward off the bird-shaped supernatural powers of Pakshirajan.

title: SAAHO
plot_des: An undercover cop becomes embroiled in a battle with warring criminals who want to acquire a "black box," their ultimate key to a treasure.

title: A MINUSCULE ADVENTURE
plot_des: When the first snow falls in the valley, it is urgent to prepare its reserves for the winter. Alas, during the operation, a small ladybug is trapped in a box - to the Caribbean. One solution: reform the shock team.

title: THE BAY BOY
plot_des: A teenage boy living in a Cape Breton coal mining community during the 1930's finds himself contemplating life and is haunted by a murder he witnessed in town.

title: BATTERIES NOT INCLUDED

title: CROSSING DELANCEY

title: DEAD ALIVE
plot_des: A young man's mother is bitten by a Sumatran rat-monkey. She gets sick and dies, at which time she comes back to life, killing and eating dogs, nurses, friends, and neighbors.

plot_des: When shy, soft-spoken Chicago detective Wayne "Mad Dog" Dobie inadvertently saves the life of local gangster Frank Milo, he's the reluctant recipient of an unusual one week "thank you" gift - a beautiful bartender named Glory.

title: TWO MUCH
plot_des: A young gallerist is in love with two sisters at the same time. In order to solve the problem he decides to invent his own twin-brother.

title: FLUBBER

title: THE NEGOTIATOR

title: DISTURBING BEHAVIOR

plot_des: During the 16th century, as Thailand contends with both a civil war and Burmese invasion, a beautiful princess rises up to help protect the glory of the Kingdom of Ayothaya. Based on the life of Queen Suriyothai.

title: RRRRRRR
plot_des: A tribe of prehistoric people is puzzled - a murder has happened. The first ever one.

plot_des: A strange black entity from another world bonds with Peter Parker and causes inner turmoil as he contends with new villains, temptations, and revenge.

title: SUPERHERO MOVIE
plot_des: Orphaned high school student Rick Riker is bitten by a radioactive dragonfly, develops super powers (except for the ability to fly), and becomes a hero.

plot_des: Shortly after a tornado rips through her Kansas home, Dorothy returns to Oz to save her friends from a villainous jester.

title: FALCO  VERDAMMT WIR LEBEN NOCH
plot_des: The life story of 80s Austrian superstar Falco, the man behind the monster hit "Rock me, Amadeus". The story of Johann "Falco" Hölzel from young kid, the road from a band to his solo career, and to his tragic death.

plot_des: It's 1987 and Danielle, the high school 'Dirty Girl', is running away. With her is chubby, gay Clarke, a bag of flour called Joan and a Walkman full of glorious '80s tunes.

plot_des: Three people, three extraordinary stories. All lived out within a hundred London streets.

title: BRIAN BANKS
plot_des: A football player's dreams to play in the NFL are halted when he is wrongly convicted and sent to prison. Years later, he fights to clear his name within an unjust system.

title: THE WITNESS
plot_des: An ordinary man witnesses a cruel murder and becomes entangled in circumstances out of his control.

plot_des: The new warden of a small prison farm in Arkansas tries to clean it up of corruption after initially posing as an inmate.

plot_des: After her last encounter, Ellen Ripley crash-lands on Fiorina 161, a maximum security prison. When a series of strange and deadly events occur shortly after her arrival, Ripley realizes that she has brought along an unwelcome visitor.

casts: ['Chuck Norris', 'Michele Lamar Richards', 'Erik von Detten', 'Carmine Caridi']

title: TWIN TOWN
plot_des: Julian and Jeremy, two brothers prefer to spend their time on drugs and joyriding. When their father, Fatty Lewis, they show up demanding compensation.

title: DANS UNE GALAXIE PRS DE CHEZ VOUS  LE FILM
plot_des: In 2039, the Romano-Fafard spaceship crew, led by Captain Patenaude, are still looking for a viable planet to resume mankind and accommodate Earth's six billion idiots. They may have finally found one but it won't be trouble free.

plot_des: Wild behavior forces a pair of energy drink reps to enroll in a Big Brother program.

plot_des: Robert Ford, who's idolized Jesse James since childhood, tries hard to join the reforming gang of the Missouri outlaw, but gradually becomes resentful of the bandit leader.

plot_des: As a police psychologist works to talk down an ex-con who is threatening to jump from a Manhattan hotel rooftop, the biggest diamond heist ever committed is in motion.

plot_des: A young boy grows up as he embarks on a quest to become a knight.

title: AN ELEPHANTS JOURNEY

title: THE FAN

plot_des: A beautiful gold digger matches wits with a shrewd Beverly Hills divorce lawyer who is increasingly attracted to her.

plot_des: A young Englishman is sent to Malaysian Borneo in the 1930s to stay with a tribe as UK's colonial representative. A local woman (J.Alba) helps him understand local tradition and language. He falls in love with her etc. despite the taboo.

plot_des: A young, compassionate man struggles to save his family and friends from the abusive exploitation of his cold-heartedly grasping uncle.

title: THE BROTHERS BLOOM

Now they've decided to take on one last job - showing a beautiful and eccentric heiress the time of her life with a romantic adventure that takes them around the world.

title: DEATH WISH

studio: Boll Kino Beteiligungs GmbH  Co KG

title: THE AMITYVILLE HORROR
plot_des: Newlyweds are terrorized by demonic forces after moving into a large house that was the site of a grisly mass murder a year before.

plot_des: In order to save their bankrupt school, a group of troublesome girls stage a robbery with a group of geniuses on their backs

plot_des: A hot-headed inspector takes on a small but powerful Vietnamese-Chinese gang, after a series of crimes and murder attempts committed and putting an undercover cop and his girlfriend in great danger.

plot_des: Xander Cage is left for dead after an incident, though he secretly returns to action for a new, tough assignment with his handler Augustus Gibbons.

plot_des: A troubled husband and executive adopts a beaver hand-puppet as his sole means of communication.

plot_des: Three magazine employees head out on an assignment to interview a guy who placed a classified advertisement seeking a companion for time travel.

plot_des: An operative for an elite private intelligence firm finds her priorities changing dramatically after she is tasked with infiltrating an anarchist group known for executing covert attacks upon major corporations.

plot_des: Identical twin gangsters Ronald and Reginald Kray terrorize London during the 1960s.

plot_des: A group of Southern California high school students are enjoying their most important subjects: sex, drugs, and rock n' roll.

plot_des: Basil, the rodent Sherlock Holmes, investigates the kidnapping of a toy maker and uncovers its link to his archenemy, Professor Ratigan.

title: STRAIGHT TO HELL
plot_des: A shorter, less violent, less musical version of STRAIGHT TO HELL RETURNS.

title: MY BOYFRIENDS BACK
plot_des: A teenage boy comes back from the dead because he is determined to win the most beautiful girl in school.

plot_des: A young girl is relegated to servitude at a boarding school when her father goes missing and is presumed dead.

title: LIVING IN OBLIVION
plot_des: This ultimate tribute to all independent filmmakers takes place during one day on the set of a non-budget movie.

title: STRIPTEASE

plot_des: Small-town love story of a young man with a reputation for womanizing and his best friend's sister.

title: HERO
plot_des: A defense officer, Nameless, was summoned by the King of Qin regarding his success of terminating three warriors.

title: JARHEAD
plot_des: A psychological study of a soldier's state of mind during the Gulf War. Told through the eyes of a U.S. Marine sniper who struggles to cope with boredom, a sense of isolation, and other issues back home.

title: SKY FIGHTERS
plot_des: An advanced, armed, French Mirage fighter jet is stolen during an air show in UK. 2 other fighter jets locate it. They're forced to shoot it down. Terrorists make another attempt to steal armed Mirages. Why?

title: THE OH IN OHIO
plot_des: Priscilla Chase is a woman who has never had an orgasm.

title: THE GRAND
plot_des: An improvisational comedy using a handful of actors playing characters competing in an actual poker tournament.

title: THE SENTINEL
plot_des: A Secret Service agent is framed as the mole in an assassination attempt on the President. He must clear his name and foil another assassination attempt while on the run from a Secret Service Protective Intelligence Division agent.

title: BACK IN BUSINESS

title: THE MIST
plot_des: A freak storm unleashes a species of bloodthirsty creatures on a small town, where a small band of citizens hole up in a supermarket and fight for their lives.

title: DOUBT
plot_des: A Catholic school principal questions a priest's ambiguous relationship with a troubled young student.

title: MACHETE
plot_des: After being set-up and betrayed by the man who hired him to assassinate a Texas Senator, an ex-Federale launches a brutal rampage of revenge against his former boss.

title: IDIOTS AND ANGELS
plot_des: Much to his surprise, an utter misanthrope is transformed into a reluctant do-gooder, when a glorious pair of angelic snow-white wings sprouts up from his back. Now, everyone in town wants a piece of his feathered appendages.

title: YOU WILL MEET A TALL DARK STRANGER
plot_des: Sally's parents' marriage breaks up when her father undergoes a mid-life crisis and impulsively weds a prostitute. Meanwhile, Sally's own marriage also begins to disintegrate.

title: HENRYS CRIME
plot_des: Released from prison for a crime he didn't commit, an ex-con targets the same bank he was sent away for robbing.

title: EXORCISMUS
plot_des: A family allows their young daughter's exorcism to be recorded secretly.

title: WINTERS TALE
plot_des: A burglar falls for an heiress as she dies in his arms. When he learns that he has the gift of reincarnation, he sets out to save her.

title: PRICE CHECK
plot_des: Peter, a family man who works for a failing supermarket chain finds his life shaken up by his new boss, Susan, who starts to groom him for an executive position. Money and opportunities are within his grasp, but at what price?

title: THE TWO FACES OF JANUARY
plot_des: A thriller centered on a con artist, his wife, and a stranger who flee Athens after one of them is caught up in the death of a private detective.

title: RAGNAROK

casts: ['Pål Sverre Hagen', 'Nicolai Cleve Broch', 'Sofia Helin', 'Bjørn Sundquist']

title: THE GUNMAN
plot_des: A sniper on a mercenary assassination team, kills the minister of mines of the Congo. Terrier's successful kill shot forces him into hiding. Returning to the Congo years later, he becomes the target of a hit squad himself.

title: VATERFREUDEN
plot_des: Felix enjoys his single life to the fullest, but a ferret bites him, sterilizing him in the process. He tries everything in his power to find the soon-to-be mother of his only child, the result of his first and last sperm donation.

title: THE CONJURING 2
plot_des: Ed and Lorraine Warren travel to North London to help a single mother raising four children alone in a house plagued by a supernatural spirit.

title: DOPE
plot_des: Life changes for Malcolm, a geek who's surviving life in a tough neighborhood, after a chance invitation to an underground party leads him and his friends into a Los Angeles adventure.

title: THE MONSTER
plot_des: A mother and daughter must confront a terrifying monster when they break down on a deserted road.

title: PLAYMOBIL THE MOVIE
plot_des: Animated feature film inspired by the Playmobil brand toys.

title: DETROIT
plot_des: Fact-based drama set during the 1967 Detroit riots in which a group of rogue police officers respond to a complaint with retribution rather than justice on their minds.

title: SWING
plot_des: A struggling musician happens upon a nightclub that's frozen in time.

title: THE CELESTINE PROPHECY

plot_des: Four friends take a break from their day-to-day lives to throw a bachelor party in Las Vegas for their last remaining single pal.

plot_des: THE GIRL KING paints a portrait of the brilliant, extravagant Kristina of Sweden, queen from age six, who fights the conservative forces that are against her ideas to modernize Sweden and who have no tolerance for her awakening sexuality.

plot_des: Based on actual events, a fisherman tries to survive in the freezing ocean after his boat capsizes off the south coast of Iceland.
casts: ['Ólafur Darri Ólafsson', 'Stefán Hallur Stefánsson', 'Joi Johannsson', 'Thora Bjorg Helga']

title: INHERENT VICE
plot_des: In 1970, drug-fueled Los Angeles private investigator Larry "Doc" Sportello investigates the disappearance of a former girlfriend.

title: A RESURRECTION

title: COMBUSTION
plot_des: Ari works with her boyfriend and another criminal, where she seduces rich men and the 2 men rob them. She seduces Mikel. Her partners aren't happy until he joins them in illegal car racing. And Mikel's rich fiancee...?

plot_des: A father struggling with bipolar disorder tries to win back his wife by attempting to take full responsibility of their two young, spirited daughters, who don't make the overwhelming task any easier.

studio: Audiovisual Development Bureau Ministerio da Cultura

plot_des: Inadvertently left at home by adults, young cousins face-off against burglars.

Two friends living in a small town during the 1960s, run away to enjoy their freedom during the Vietnam War, thus disappointing the father of one of them. When they return to town, they realize the importance of family unity.

title: THE BALLAD OF JACK AND ROSE
plot_des: A father and daughter isolated on an island off the East Coast and living on a once-thriving commune grapple with the limits of family and sexuality.

Though both man and monster are seeking revenge for violence committed against them, Kainan leads the alliance to kill the Moorwen by fusing his advanced technology with the Viking's Iron Age weaponry.

During riots more than 790 Muslim and 289 Hindus died and around 300 people missing in the Indian state of Gujarat.

title: THE SADDEST MUSIC IN THE WORLD

plot_des: A fictional version of the events that led to the assassination of the Dutch politician Pim Fortuyn on May 6, 2002.

plot_des: A young pickpocket in the New York subways, living a fast, free, lifestyle is confronted by a woman with whom he had a one night affair.

title: WOODLAWN
plot_des: A gifted high school football player must learn to embrace his talent and his faith as he battles racial tensions on and off the field.

casts: ['Oscar Isaac', 'Charlotte Le Bon', 'Christian Bale', 'Daniel Giménez Cacho']

title: A BAG OF MARBLES
plot_des: In occupied France, Maurice and Joseph, two young Jewish brothers left to their own devices demonstrate an incredible amount of cleverness, courage, and ingenuity to escape the enemy invasion and to try to reunite their family once again.

plot_des: Alcoholic billionaire playboy Arthur Bach must marry a woman he does not love, or he will be cut off from his $750,000,000 fortune. But when Arthur falls in love with a poor waitress, he must decide if he wants to choose love or money.

plot_des: He had everything and wanted nothing. He learned that he had nothing and wanted everything. He saved the world and then it shattered. The path to enlightenment is as sharp and narrow as a razor's edge.

plot_des: The Predator returns to Earth, this time to stake a claim on the war-torn streets of a dystopian Los Angeles.

plot_des: When a man inadvertently makes Santa fall off of his roof on Christmas Eve, he finds himself magically recruited to take his place.

plot_des: After losing her job, making out with her soon-to-be former boss, and finding out that her daughter plans to spend Thanksgiving with her boyfriend, Claudia Larson faces spending the holiday with her family.

plot_des: When letters written to God start getting results, and replies, people everywhere are amazed. The post office, however, is annoyed.

As their relationship blossoms, he discovers humans actually eat honey, and subsequently decides to sue them.

Now, Frankie is released and back on the streets with no money and no place to go.

plot_des: Based on "Romance of the Three Kingdoms" by Luo Guangzhong. It ranks as one of China's four most important pieces of literature.

A scientist invents a time machine, which leads to a bitter battle between his evil twin brother and his son.

plot_des: An unimpressive, everyday man is forced into a situation where he is told to kill a politician to save his kidnapped daughter.

plot_des: An angel on Earth, a doctor unable to believe, a patient with a secret, a love story made in Heaven.

title: ENDERS GAME
plot_des: Young Ender Wiggin is recruited by the International Military to lead the fight against the Formics, an insectoid alien race who had previously tried to invade Earth and had inflicted heavy losses on humankind.

studio: Ce Qui Me Meut Motion Pictures

plot_des: 12 August 1945, 11 AM. Two mysterious strangers dressed in black appear at the railway station of a Hungarian village. Within a few hours, everything changes.

title: CRAZY ALIEN
plot_des: A monkey trainer whose act goes wrong after an alien crash lands on Earth and injures his monkey. Desperate to perform the act, he attempts to train the alien instead, though is punished after the alien regains his powers.

plot_des: The story of the Battle of Midway, told by the leaders and the sailors who fought it.

plot_des: After escaping the insane asylum in which he was incarcerated, Jerry Blake (Terry O'Quinn) impersonates a marriage counselor and manages to win over a patient (Meg Foster) and her young son (Jonathan Brandis).

title: AIR AMERICA

title: MR BASEBALL
plot_des: Jack Elliot, once a great baseball player, is forced to play in Japan where his brash, egotistical ways cause friction with his new teammates and friends.

title: IGBY GOES DOWN

title: JUST MARRIED

title: SYMPATHY FOR MR VENGEANCE

title: YOU GOT SERVED
plot_des: In order to achieve their dream of opening a recording studio, two friends (Omarion, Houston) must first win their city's dance contest -- a fierce competition that pits them against a group of tough street dancers.

plot_des: In 2054, Paris is a labyrinth where all movement is monitored and recorded. Casting a shadow over everything is the city's largest company, Avalon, which insinuates itself into every aspect of contemporary life to sell its primary export, youth and beauty. In this world of stark contrasts and rigid laws, the populace is kept in line and accounted for.

title: CAPTAIN ALATRISTE THE SPANISH MUSKETEER

title: PERCY JACKSON  THE OLYMPIANS THE LIGHTNING THIEF
plot_des: A teenager discovers he's the descendant of a Greek god and sets out on an adventure to settle an on-going battle between the gods.

title: SUKIYAKI WESTERN DJANGO
plot_des: A nameless gunfighter arrives in a town ripped apart by rival gangs and, though courted by both to join, chooses his own path.

title: MUMBAI MERI JAAN

title: THE IMPOSSIBLE

plot_des: A forest by the sea. Three friends. A girl. Friendship, love. Can they overcome prejudices and go back to being friends again?

title: BPM BEATS PER MINUTE
plot_des: Members of the advocacy group ACT UP Paris demand action by the government and pharmaceutical companies to combat the AIDS epidemic in the early 1990s.

title: AVA
plot_des: 13-year-old Ava learns that she will lose her sight sooner than expected, and she confronts the problem in her own way.

title: A MADEA FAMILY FUNERAL
plot_des: A joyous family reunion becomes a hilarious nightmare as Madea and the crew travel to backwoods Georgia, where they find themselves unexpectedly planning a funeral that might unveil unsavory family secrets.

title: JAWS 3D
plot_des: A giant thirty-five-foot shark becomes trapped in a SeaWorld theme park and it's up to the sons of police chief Brody to rescue everyone.

title: SILVER BULLET
plot_des: In a small town, brutal killings start to plague the close knit community. Marty Coslaw, a paraplegic boy, is convinced the murders are the doings of a werewolf.

title: DEAD RINGERS
plot_des: Twin gynecologists take full advantage of the fact that nobody can tell them apart, until their relationship begins to deteriorate over a woman.

title: DEAD CALM
plot_des: After a tragedy, John Ingram and his wife Rae are spending some time isolated at sea, when they come across a stranger who has abandoned a sinking ship.

title: THE FIRST POWER
plot_des: A dedicated L.A. police detective and a female psychic must stop a demonic serial killer who was given the powers of resurrection, teleportation and possession.

title: GREEN CARD
plot_des: A man wanting to stay in the US enters into a marriage of convenience, but it turns into more than that.

title: THE HARD WAY
plot_des: An action movie star researching a role is allowed to tag along with a hardboiled New York City policeman, who finds him superficial and irritating.

title: THE NET
plot_des: A computer programmer stumbles upon a conspiracy, putting her life and the lives of those around her in great danger.

title: BOGUS
plot_des: Recently orphaned, a young boy is taken in by his godmother who is shocked to realize that she can see the boy's imaginary friend: a flamboyant, French magician named Bogus.

title: THE BARBER OF SIBERIA
plot_des: At the turn of the century, a young Russian cadet falls in love with an American beauty, endangering his career and even their lives.

title: BLADE
plot_des: A half-vampire, half-mortal man becomes a protector of the mortal race, while slaying evil vampires.

title: WHAT PLANET ARE YOU FROM
plot_des: A human-looking alien from a highly advanced but emotionless all-male society is sent to Earth to impregnate a woman and bring the child back to their planet. The alien ends up falling in love there. A suspicious F.A.A. Agent targets him.

title: THE 24TH DAY
plot_des: Tom (Speedman) and Dan's (Marsden) one-night stand turns into an intense power-play between captor and captive.

title: THE MIRACLE OF BERN
plot_des: A young boy from a working class family in post-war Germany struggles with his estranged father returning from war captivity, while a friend of his plays for the German National Soccer Team at the 1954 FIFA World Cup in Switzerland.

title: DALTRY CALHOUN
plot_des: In small town Tennessee, a ne'er-do-well man (Knoxville) wrestling for control over his fading golf club is reunited with his estranged daughter, a 14-year-old musical prodigy.

title: TWIST
plot_des: A queer "Oliver Twist" update set in the hustler district of modern-day Toronto.

title: THE RING TWO
plot_des: 6 months after the incidents involving the lethal videotape, new clues prove that there is a new evil lurking in the darkness.

title: POOHS HEFFALUMP MOVIE
plot_des: When Roo sets off on his own into the Hundred Acre Wood, he discovers a friendly and playful Heffalump named Lumpy.

title: THE BOURNE ULTIMATUM
plot_des: Jason Bourne dodges a ruthless C.I.A. official and his Agents from a new assassination program while searching for the origins of his life as a trained killer.

title: HOW TO TRAIN YOUR DRAGON
plot_des: A hapless young Viking who aspires to hunt dragons becomes the unlikely friend of a young dragon himself, and learns there may be more to the creatures than he assumed.

title: POETRY
plot_des: A sixty-something woman, faced with the discovery of a heinous family crime and in the early stages of Alzheimer's disease, finds strength and purpose when she enrolls in a poetry class.

title: THE TWILIGHT SAGA BREAKING DAWN  PART 1
plot_des: The Quileutes close in on expecting parents Edward and Bella, whose unborn child poses a threat to the Wolf Pack and the towns people of Forks.

title: THE OOGIELOVES IN THE BIG BALLOON ADVENTURE
plot_des: The Oogieloves, Goobie, Zoozie, and Toofie, set out to find five magical balloons that will make their good friend Schluufy's surprise birthday party extra special.

title: KICKASS 2
plot_des: Following Kick-Ass' heroics, other citizens are inspired to become masked crusaders. But Red Mist leads his own group of evil supervillains to get revenge, kill Kick-Ass and destroy everything he stands for.

title: A REAL VERMEER
plot_des: The life story of Dutch painter Han van Meegeren, from his beginnings as a rebellious young artist in 1920s Amsterdam to his rise to infamy as one of the most ingenious art forgers of all time.

title: PENUMBRA
plot_des: A woman hesitantly rents an apartment to an eerie man who she soon realizes has a part in the solar eclipse that is taking place.

title: SOUTHPAW
plot_des: After a fatal incident sends him on a rampant path of destruction, a champion boxer fights to get custody of his daughter and revive his professional career.

title: EXTRATERRESTRIAL
plot_des: A group of friends on a weekend trip to a cabin in the woods find themselves terrorized by alien visitors.

title: THE NIGHT EATS THE WORLD
plot_des: The morning after a party, a young man wakes up to find Paris invaded by zombies.

title: HIGH LIFE
plot_des: A father and his daughter struggle to survive in deep space where they live in isolation.

title: DORA AND THE LOST CITY OF GOLD
plot_des: Dora, a teenage explorer, leads her friends on an adventure to save her parents and solve the mystery behind a lost city of gold.

title: THE GODS MUST BE CRAZY
plot_des: A comic allegory about a traveling Bushman who encounters modern civilization and its stranger aspects, including a clumsy scientist and a band of revolutionaries.

title: NATIONAL LAMPOONS EUROPEAN VACATION
plot_des: The Griswolds win a vacation tour across Europe where the usual havoc ensues.

title: THE MISSION
plot_des: Eighteenth-century Spanish Jesuits try to protect a remote South American tribe in danger of falling under the rule of pro-slavery Portugal.

title: THE LIVING DAYLIGHTS
plot_des: James Bond is sent to investigate a KGB policy to kill all enemy spies and uncovers an arms deal that potentially has major global ramifications.

title: THE LOVERS ON THE BRIDGE
plot_des: Alex, who's homeless and addicted to alcohol, and Michèle, who's losing her sight, form a relationship while sleeping rough on Paris's Pont-Neuf bridge.

title: BODY SNATCHERS
plot_des: A teenage girl and her father discover alien clones are replacing humans on a remote U.S. military base in Alabama.

title: TIMECOP
plot_des: Max Walker, an officer for a security agency that regulates time travel, must fend for his life against a shady politician who's intent on changing the past to control the future.

title: CHAIN REACTION
plot_des: Two researchers in a green alternative energy project are put on the run when they are framed for murder and treason.

title: JACKIE BROWN
plot_des: A middle-aged woman finds herself in the middle of a huge conflict that will either make her a profit or cost her life.

title: A THOUSAND ACRES
plot_des: A family is torn apart after a father gives his valuable farm land to his daughters.

title: PECKER
plot_des: A talented young photographer, who enjoys snapping photos of his satirical, perverted Baltimore neighborhood and his wacky family, gets dragged into a world of pretentious artists from New York City and finds newfound fame.

title: ROUNDERS
plot_des: A young, reformed gambler must return to playing big stakes poker to help a friend pay off loan sharks, while balancing his relationship with his girlfriend and his commitments to law school.

title: THE MUMMY RETURNS
plot_des: The mummified body of Imhotep is shipped to a museum in London, where he once again wakes and begins his campaign of rage and terror.

title: THE BOURNE IDENTITY
plot_des: A man is picked up by a fishing boat, bullet-riddled and suffering from amnesia, before racing to elude assassins and attempting to regain his memory.

title: YAMAKASI
plot_des: 7 guys from Paris' suburbs like challenges like climbing tall buildings and doing parkour - especially with cops/flics chasing them. When a kid fan urgently needs a heart the Yamakasis try to find a way.

title: THE TUXEDO
plot_des: A hapless chauffeur must take a comatose Secret Agent's place using his special gadget-laden tuxedo.

title: DELOVELY
plot_des: Inspecting a magical biographical stage musical, composer Cole Porter reviews his life and career with his wife, Linda.

title: THE CROODS
plot_des: After their cave is destroyed, a caveman family must trek through an unfamiliar fantastical world with the help of an inventive boy.

title: THE WOLFMAN
plot_des: Upon his return to his ancestral homeland, an American man is bitten, and subsequently cursed by, a werewolf.

title: THE CHILDREN OF HUANG SHI
plot_des: About young British journalist, George Hogg, who with the assistance of a courageous Australian nurse, saves a group of orphaned children during the Japanese occupation of China in 1937.

title: THE LONE RANGER
plot_des: Native American warrior Tonto recounts the untold tales that transformed John Reid, a man of the law, into a legend of justice.

title: DOCTOR STRANGE
plot_des: While on a journey of physical and spiritual healing, a brilliant neurosurgeon is drawn into the world of the mystic arts.

title: IMMIGRATION TANGO
plot_des: An American couple and a foreign couple test the limits of friendship and love when they switch partners and get married for green cards.

title: DIVERGENT
plot_des: In a world divided by factions based on virtues, Tris learns she's Divergent and won't fit in. When she discovers a plot to destroy Divergents, Tris and the mysterious Four must find out what makes Divergents dangerous before it's too late.

title: DEMONIC
plot_des: A police officer and a psychologist investigate the deaths of five people who were killed while trying to summon ghosts.

title: ANJATHE
plot_des: Sathya and Kiruba are friends. Sathya is reckless and gets into drinking and violent fights whereas Kiruba studies hard to become a Sub-Inspector. Tables are turned when Sathya becomes a Sub-Inspector.

title: LORE
plot_des: As the Allies sweep across Germany, Lore leads her siblings on a journey that exposes them to the truth of their parents' beliefs. An encounter with a mysterious refugee forces Lore to rely on a person she has always been taught to hate.

title: THE COUNSELOR
plot_des: A lawyer finds himself in over his head when he gets involved in drug trafficking.

title: BLACK OR WHITE
plot_des: A grieving widower is drawn into a custody battle over his granddaughter, whom he helped raise her entire life.

title: PUNJAB 1984
plot_des: During a time of political turmoil, a mother goes on a journey in search of her missing son, who has been misjudged and labeled a terrorist.

title: APOSTASY
plot_des: A faithful Jehovah's Witness is forced to shun her own sister because of a religious transgression. As the separation draws out, she starts to question the meaning of God's love.

title: ICE
plot_des: Contemporary Russia. Nadya gives up her dream of becoming a champion figure skater when she is hospitalized with an injury. But then she meets Sasha, a hockey player, who decides to teach her to believe in herself and her dream again.

title: TOP FUNNY COMEDIAN THE MOVIE
plot_des: A spin-off of a Chinese variety show of the same name, it involves a number of characters getting involved in a series of misadventures during a visit to Macau.

title: BATMAN AND HARLEY QUINN
plot_des: Batman and Nightwing are forced to team with the Joker's sometimes-girlfriend Harley Quinn to stop a global threat brought about by Poison Ivy and Jason Woodrue, the Floronic Man.

title: RAAZI
plot_des: A Kashmiri woman agrees to marry a Pakistani army officer in order to spy on Pakistan during the Indo-Pakistan War of 1971.

title: THE JEWEL OF THE NILE
plot_des: When Joan Wilder is abducted while on a trip along the Nile, her boyfriend, Jack Colton, and pal Ralph rush to rescue her and retrieve a fabled jewel.

title: TRACK 29
plot_des: Linda is still tormented by giving up a baby for adoption at 15. She wants a baby, but her husband has enough in his model trains, mistress and being a doctor.

title: PET SEMATARY
plot_des: After tragedy strikes, a grieving father discovers an ancient burial ground behind his home with the power to raise the dead.

title: SCANDAL
plot_des: Based on the Profumo Scandal of 1963, an affair between an exotic dancer and the Minister of War shakes up the British government.

title: THE BOYFRIEND SCHOOL
plot_des: Cartoonist Gus has survived cancer treatment and now his romance novelist sister tries to find him a woman and guide him. Will they succeed?

title: HERO
plot_des: A not-so-nice man rescues passengers from a crashed airliner, only to see someone else take credit.

title: FREAKED
plot_des: A vain actor, his best friend, and an activist end up at a mutant freak farm run by a weirdo scientist.

title: THE RIVER WILD
plot_des: Rafting expert Gail takes on a pair of armed killers while navigating a spectacularly violent river.

title: THE CITY OF LOST CHILDREN
plot_des: A scientist in a surrealist society kidnaps children to steal their dreams, hoping that they slow his aging process.

title: CLOCKSTOPPERS
plot_des: A teenager accidentally activates a machine that enables him to speed up his body so that other people seem to be standing still.

title: THE TAILOR OF PANAMA
plot_des: A tailor living in Panama reluctantly becomes a spy for a British Agent.

title: GERRY
plot_des: A friendship between two young men is tested when they go for a hike in a desert and forget to bring any water or food with them.

title: THE EXORCISM OF EMILY ROSE
plot_des: A lawyer takes on a negligent homicide case involving a priest who performed an exorcism on a young girl.

title: FREE ZONE
plot_des: Two women embark on a road trip after they are brought together by circumstance. Rebecca (Portman) flees her hotel after a fight with her mother-in-law (Maura) and hails a taxi driven by Hanna (Lazlo).

title: MIRRORS
plot_des: An ex-cop and his family are the target of an evil force that is using mirrors as a gateway into their home.

title: WILD CHILD
plot_des: A rebellious Malibu princess is shipped off to a strict English boarding school by her father.

title: KILL THE IRISHMAN
plot_des: The true story of Danny Greene, a tough Irish thug working for mobsters in Cleveland during the 1970's.

title: THE COLLECTION
plot_des: A man who escapes from the vicious grips of the serial killer known as "The Collector" is then forced to help rescue an innocent girl from the killer's booby-trapped lair.

title: AFTERSHOCK
plot_des: In Chile, a group of travelers who are in an underground nightclub when a massive earthquake hits quickly learn that reaching the surface is just the beginning of their nightmare.

title: A GUN IN EACH HAND
plot_des: A comedy centered on eight men in their 40s, all with identity crises.

title: MY NAME IS LENNY
plot_des: The life story of one of Britain's most notorious bare-knuckle fighters, Lenny McLean, also known as "the Guv'nor".

title: THE SACRAMENT
plot_des: A news team trails a man as he travels into the world of Eden Parish to find his missing sister, where it becomes apparent that this paradise may not be as it seems.

title: THE VISITORS BASTILLE DAY
plot_des: Knight Godefroy de Montmirail and squire Jacquouille are stranded in 1793. Using trickery to break free from their shackles, both perilously partake in the Montmirail family's run away in the quest for an exiting time-shift.

title: 99 HOMES
plot_des: A recently unemployed single father struggles to get back his foreclosed home by working for the real estate broker who is the source of his frustration.

title: DGN DERNEK
plot_des: A group of people in an eastern Turkish village are enlisted to throw a big and brash wedding in ten days notice.

title: RATTER
plot_des: A young graduate student is tormented by a stalker who hacks into her electronic devices and monitors her every move.

title: CARDBOARD GANGSTERS
plot_des: A group of young Cardboard Gangsters attempt to gain control of the drug trade in Darndale, chasing the glorified lifestyle of money, power and sex.

title: TUBELIGHT
plot_des: A story of two brothers set during the Sino-Indian war, 1962: the younger one who's at war at the borders and the elder who's at war with his own world.

title: DONT LET GO
plot_des: After a man's family dies in what appears to be a murder, he gets a phone call from one of the dead, his niece. He's not sure if she's a ghost or if he's going mad, but as it turns out, he's not.

title: THE GREAT BATTLE
plot_des: A historical film about the siege of Ansi Fortress and the epic eighty-eight day battle that Yang Man-chun and his Goguryeo troops fought against 500,000 invading Tang dynasty men to defend it.

title: MISSION OF HONOR
plot_des: The exploits of 303 Squadron RAF during the Battle of Britain. The squadron consisted of Polish pilots, many of whom were veterans of the air battles involved in Germany's invasion of Poland.
